column1: 3.3.2.3	  Recommendations for laboratory examinations and stone analysis [21, 27, 67-69]
Dipstick test of spot urine sample:  • red cells;  • white cells;  • nitrites;  • approximate urine pH;  • urine microscopy and/or culture.
Serum blood sample:  • creatinine;  • uric acid;  • (ionised) calcium;  • sodium;  • potassium;  • blood cell count;  • C-reactive protein.
